tags: as is all the discourse here
and there is less and less capability to have rational discussions
body:
Tumblr discourse

It’s so sad going to the GoT tags and seeing all the discourse of how you are a sexist, mysoginist, racist, xenophobic, ableist piece of shit if you don’t agree with how utterly perfect Daenerys is, how she is totally selfless and without fault, and how she HAS to get the Iron Throne because she has suffered a lot and it’s what she wants, and if you don’t want her to rule you should die for your sins

Like, her stans have gotten to the point where it’s all or nothing, you either support her 10000% or hate women, there’s no middle ground

And now there’s just no space for mindsets like mine, who think that even though she’s a good person and tries to do the right thing, she has her faults (like every other character), and her wanting the throne and feeling entitled to the Seven Kingdoms does not mean she should end up there

You can like a character and disagree with their ultimate goals, just because you wish something different for them it doesn’t make you a hater or an anti

Like, her stans have gotten to the point where it’s all or nothing, you either support her 10000% or hate women, there’s no middle ground

And now there’s just no space for mindsets like mine, who think that even though she’s a good person and tries to do the right thing, she has her faults (like every other character), and her wanting the throne and feeling entitled to the Seven Kingdoms does not mean she should end up there

summary: VALEZKA HORNWOOD   [ A small house, with a small army, House Hornwood has stood strong for hundreds of years in the North. They...
caption:
VALEZKA HORNWOOD 

 [ A small house, with a small army, House Hornwood has stood strong for hundreds of years in the North. They are as fierce as they are loyal, and when the Lord of House Hornwood fell in battle along side Robb Stark - his eldest daughter quickly took the reigns from her incompetent younger brother. 

Valezka would not let their house fall to the Boltons. ]

Indie Game of Thrones OC · 18+  ·  Not selective, and looking to rp with other ocs and canon characters.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary:
basically making my own prompt lol maybe i’ll write this if i have the energy 
- arya rejects gendry (even though she loves him)...
body:
basically making my own prompt lol maybe i’ll write this if i have the energy

- arya rejects gendry (even though she loves him) because she feels she’s too messed up for love and has to finish her list

- dany offers her anything she wants for defeating the night king

- arya asks dany to legitimise gendry as a baratheon

D: “arya, that would give him a claim to the iron throne”

A: “he doesn’t want the throne. i just know he wants to feel like he belongs.”

- after a pause

D: “you love him”

- arya goes to speak but dany interrupts her

D: “that wasn’t a question”

- another pause, arya is conflicted and torn

A: “i have to finish my list…i can’t be distracted”

- dany

D: “in my times of doubt i tell myself, if i look back, i am lost…so i look forward. i think you owe it to yourself to do the same”

- arya stares at dany in understanding as she takes out a scroll and begins to write a royal decree of gendry’s legitimisation. she hands it to arya with a knowing look and says “it needs his signature too.” arya takes it to gendry and apologises for being so stupid and they get together yay

- this is the only way i’ll be happy for the rejection spoilers to be real lmao

summary: Hey you Sally here 😌  As far as I can remember you said you can speak Korean fluently and I just wanted to know if you learned...
question: Hey you Sally here 😌  As far as I can remember you said you can speak Korean fluently and I just wanted to know if you learned it by yourself or if you took classes? 🤔  PS: If you just started to watch GoT you’re going to change your mind about Sansa but yes she’s quite annoying in S1 😅
answer:
HI SALLY 💗 how are you?

I’m not quite fluent but I can understand when being spoken to (most of the time), read and write!! I always get stumped when responding because of formal and informal speech tho.

I learned my pronunciation and accent from KDrama, so I highly suggest watching them if you currently don’t. Koreans I meet think I lived in Seoul for 3 years because it sounds native LOL.

I learned how to read and write through a 6 week summer course at my university, as well as to conversate, then I expanded my knowledge by talking to people outside of my circle, like my customers etc. I also downloaded KakaoTalk bc most people I meet at work, always want my ID or number lmao.

But yeah! I pretty much learned through self and uni study. If you’re able to self-study then I’d definitely do that because it’s not as hard as it seems. The only tricky parts are grammar rules and some pronounciations, like I’m still getting the hang of it but that’s just because I’m a useless student. Lol.

ALSO: after like 4 years, I gave into peer pressure and began watching it and all I can say is — fucking Sansa, Catelyn, Viserys, Joffrey, Jamie, Cersei…the whole bloody lot are making me mad. I have to take breaks or else I get too riled up.
